alert.note: Alert for Clarke; Monroe; Wilcox (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 20 at 9:27PM CDT until April 21 at 8:42PM CDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Alabama... Alabama River Near Claiborne Dam affecting Clarke, Wilcox and Monroe Counties. For the Alabama River...including Millers Ferry Dam, Claiborne Dam... Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL TOMORROW EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Alabama River Near Claiborne Dam. * WHEN...Until tomorrow evening. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:00 PM CDT Wednesday the stage was 42.7 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage early tomorrow afternoon and continue falling to 29.3 feet Monday evening. - Flood stage is 42.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued when updates occur.
